entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
